name: Cuba Libre
description: Fiction, Cuban history, thrill romance and rum: what more could you ask for!

name: The road
description: A man, his son, dead wife and a world trying to eradicate them both! This book is deep, dark but profound. It explores the timeless threads that binds the animal kingdom: violence, hope, and survival. Yet, in one of Cormac McCarthy's darkest novel, one can see the humanity in it all.
